Package de.lessvoid.nifty.render

Interface NiftyRenderEngine

All Known Implementing Classes:
NiftyRenderEngineImpl
public interface NiftyRenderEngine
NiftyRenderEngine interface. This is considered a private API. Use methods on the main Nifty instance instead.

  • Method Details

    • getWidth

      int getWidth()
      Get Width of Display mode. This will always return the base resolution if auto scaling is enabled.
      Returns:
      width of display mode

    • getHeight

      int getHeight()
      Get Height of Display mode. This will always return the base resolution if auto scaling is enabled.
      Returns:
      height of display mode

    • getNativeWidth

      int getNativeWidth()
      This will always return the current native display resolution independent of the auto scaling mode.
      Returns:
      the native display width

    • getNativeHeight

      int getNativeHeight()
      This will always return the current native display resolution independent of the auto scaling mode.
      Returns:
      the native display height

    • beginFrame

      void beginFrame()
      Called when a frame begins.

    • endFrame

      void endFrame()
      Called when a frame ends.

    • clear

      void clear()
      Clear the screen.

    • createImage

      @Nullable NiftyImage createImage(@Nonnull Screen screen, @Nonnull String name, boolean filterLinear)
      Create a new Image. Attention: use nifty.createImage() instead! This method has changed in Nifty 1.3.3 - sorry :) You should probably never need to call methods on the NiftyRenderEngine directly though.
      Parameters:
      screen - the Screen this image is connected to
      name - file name to use
      filterLinear - filter
      Returns:
      the created nifty image or null if loading a image with a assigned name failed

    • createFont

      @Nullable RenderFont createFont(@Nonnull String name)
      Create a new RenderFont.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the font
      Returns:
      RenderFont instance

    • getFontname

      @Nonnull String getFontname(@Nonnull RenderFont font)
      Returns the original filename of the given RenderFont.
      Parameters:
      font - RenderFont to get the name from
      Returns:
      the filename of the font
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - in case the render font was not load by the engine and can't be matched to a file name

    • renderQuad

      void renderQuad(int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Render a quad.

    • renderQuad

      void renderQuad(int x, int y, int width, int height, @Nonnull Color topLeft, @Nonnull Color topRight, @Nonnull Color bottomRight, @Nonnull Color bottomLeft)
      Renders a quad with different colors at the quad vertices.

    • renderImage

      void renderImage(@Nonnull NiftyImage image, int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Render Image.
      Parameters:
      image - the image to render
      x - the x position on the screen
      y - the y position on the screen
      width - the width
      height - the height

    • renderText

      void renderText(@Nonnull String text, int x, int y, int selectionStart, int selectionEnd, @Nonnull Color textSelectionColor)
      renderText.
      Parameters:
      text - text
      x - x
      y - y
      selectionStart - selection start
      selectionEnd - selection end
      textSelectionColor - color for text selections

    • setFont

      void setFont(@Nullable RenderFont font)
      Set the font that is supposed to be used to render a text.

      In case the font is never set or unloaded by setting it to null any attempt to render a text will fail.

      Parameters:
      font - the font to use or null to unload the font

    • getFont

      @Nullable RenderFont getFont()
      Get the font that is currently applied to the engine and used for all text rendering operations. This may be null in case no font is set.
      Returns:
      font the font to use

    • setColor

      void setColor(@Nonnull Color colorParam)
      Set the color used for the next rendering operations. In case the rendering functions have own color arguments, this color value is not used.
      Parameters:
      colorParam - new color value to use, this instance is not stored in the engine, rather its values are copied to a internal storage

    • setColorAlpha

      void setColorAlpha(float newColorAlpha)
      Set only the alpha value of the current color to a new value.
      Parameters:
      newColorAlpha - new alpha value

    • setColorIgnoreAlpha

      void setColorIgnoreAlpha(@Nonnull Color color)
      Set only the color component of the given color. This will not apply the alpha value.
      Parameters:
      color - color the new color value

    • isColorChanged

      boolean isColorChanged()
      Check if the color got changed since the last start of a frame.
      Returns:
      true if the color got changed since starting the frame

    • isColorAlphaChanged

      boolean isColorAlphaChanged()
      Check if the alpha component of the color got changed since the start of the current frame.
      Returns:
      true in case the alpha component got changed

    • setBlendMode

      void setBlendMode(@Nonnull BlendMode blendMode)
      Set BlendMode.

    • moveTo

      void moveTo(float xParam, float yParam)
      Move to the given x/y position.

    • moveToRelative

      void moveToRelative(float xParam, float yParam)
      Move to the given x/y position but respect any previously set position using moveTo.
      Parameters:
      xParam - x
      yParam - y

    • enableClip

      void enableClip(int x0, int y0, int x1, int y1)
      Enable clipping to the given region.

    • setAbsoluteClip

      void setAbsoluteClip(int x0, int y0, int x1, int y1)
      Clip an absolute region
      Parameters:
      x0 - X coordinates of left-upper corner
      y0 - Y coordinates of left-upper corner
      x1 - X coordinates of right-bottom corner
      y1 - Y coordinates of right-bottom corner
      See Also:
      • Nifty.setAbsoluteClip(int, int, int, int)

    • applyAbsoluteClip

      void applyAbsoluteClip()

    • disableAbsoluteClip

      void disableAbsoluteClip()
      Disable absolute clipping.

    • disableClip

      void disableClip()
      Disable the clipping.

    • setRenderTextSize

      void setRenderTextSize(float size)
      Set RenderTextSize.
      Parameters:
      size - size

    • setImageScale

      void setImageScale(float scale)
      set image size.
      Parameters:
      scale - new image size

    • setGlobalPosition

      void setGlobalPosition(float xPos, float yPos)
      set global position.

    • saveStates

      void saveStates()
      Save all internal state values of the render engine.

      The saved state is stored inside a stack. Calling the restoreStates() function retrieves the last stored value from the stack and restores it.

      The stack has to be cleared out until the beginFrame() function is called next, else the states will be wiped and a severe warning is raised.

    • restoreStates

      void restoreStates()
      Restore the last saved state.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - in case the stack of stored states is empty

    • getRenderDevice

      @Nonnull RenderDevice getRenderDevice()
      Get the render device used by the engine.
      Returns:
      the render device

    • disposeImage

      void disposeImage(@Nonnull RenderImage image)
      Dispose image.
      Parameters:
      image - image to dispose

    • reload

      @Nonnull RenderImage reload(@Nonnull RenderImage image)
      Dispose the given image and reload it.
      Parameters:
      image - image
      Returns:
      the reloaded image

    • displayResolutionChanged

      void displayResolutionChanged()
      This is called from Nifty when it receives the resolutionChange notify from application code. The RenderEngine will update the cached values of width/height from the RenderDevice it has stored inside.

    • enableAutoScaling

      void enableAutoScaling(int baseResolutionX, int baseResolutionY)

    • enableAutoScaling

      void enableAutoScaling(int baseResolutionX, int baseResolutionY, float scaleX, float scaleY)

    • disableAutoScaling

      void disableAutoScaling()

      int convertToNativeX(int x)

    • convertToNativeHeight

      int convertFromNativeX(int x)

    • convertFromNativeY

      int convertFromNativeY(int y)

    • convertToNativeTextSizeX

      float convertToNativeTextSizeX(float size)

      float convertToNativeTextSizeY(float size)

    • screenStarted

      void screenStarted(@Nonnull Screen screen)
      Called by Nifty when the given screen has started.
      Parameters:
      screen - the screen that has just started

    • screenEnded

      void screenEnded(@Nonnull Screen screen)
      Called by Nifty when the given screen has ended.
      Parameters:
      screen - the screen that has just ended

    • screensClear

      void screensClear(@Nonnull Collection<Screen> screens)
      All screens are about to be removed because a new XML is being loaded.
      Parameters:
      screens - the collection of Screens that will be removed

    • screenAdded

      void screenAdded(@Nonnull Screen screen)
      The given Screen has been added.
      Parameters:
      screen - the added Screen

    • screenRemoved

      void screenRemoved(@Nonnull Screen screen)
      The given Screen has been removed.
      Parameters:
      screen - the removed Screen
